4. Shawn McCaskill - Mayor

Shawn McCaskill - Mayor
=======================

Civic Engagement
----------------

* Mayor (2024 - present)
* Place 3 (2022 - 2024)
* Elected to City Council, Place 2 (2015 – 2021)
* Mayor Pro Tem (2019 - 2021, 2023 - 2024)
* Deputy Mayor Pro Tem (2016 - 2019, 2022 - 2023)

### City Committees and Working Groups

* Southlake Parks Development Corporation (2015 - 2021)
* Tax Increment Reinvestment Zone (TIRZ) No.1 (2015-2021, 2022 - present)
* Youth Sports Association Task Force (2015 - present)
* Audit Committee (2016 - 2021, 2022 - present)
* Bob Jones Nature Center Board of Directors
* Corridor Planning Committee (2017 - present)
* COVID-19 Economic Recovery Task Force (2020)

### **Board and Commission Service**

* Planning and Zoning Commission (2013-2015)
* Southlake 2030 Committee, Sustainability Committee (2013- 2015)
* Zoning Board of Adjustment (2010-2013)

### Professional

* Attorney, President, and Managing Shareholder at the law firm of Godwin Bowman PC (Dallas, Texas)
* St. Mary's University School of Law (San Antonio, Texas) (Juris Doctorate 1998)
* Board Certified in Civil Appellate Law by the Texas Board of Legal Specialization

### Personal

* Married to Laura Vecchio McCaskill
* Four children (All Carroll ISD Dragons)
* Southlake Resident for over 20 years.
* Member of White's Chapel United Methodist Church
* Member of the Kiwanis Club of Southlake
* Member of the Carroll ISD PTO for Special Education
* Member of the Southlake Chamber of Commerce Board of Directors (2021 - present)
* Member of Swim 4 Elise Foundation Board of Directors (2021 - present)

Shawn McCaskill   Deputy Mayor Pro Tem - Place 3
------------------------------------------------

Mayor Shawn McCaskill
---------------------

[**Email**](mailto:mayormccaskill@cityofsouthlake.com)  
1400 Main Street, Suite 270  
Southlake, Texas 76092  
(817) 748-8016

Elected 2024  
Term Expires: May 2027
